messages.subject: Pictures moved
messages.msgSnippet: FYI : I moved the pictures to the photos section to the folder The Many Incarnations of Saitou and put the original contributor s name with the description. --
messages.messageBody:
FYI : I moved the pictures to the photos section to the folder The Many
Incarnations of Saitou and put the original contributor's name with the
description.

--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net

messages.subject: Pictures in the text files
messages.msgSnippet: There are three Saito pictures uploaded in the files section. While I appreciate a good pic of the Wolf as much as the next fangirl, I would like to remind
messages.messageBody:
There are three Saito pictures uploaded in the files section. While I
appreciate a good pic of the Wolf as much as the next fangirl, I
would like to remind everyone that the files section is for text
files only. Pictures take up much needed space in the files section
and we have folders in the photo section for Saito pics. Please
remove the pics and place them there within the next couple of days.
This is the last warning that will be given. The next pics found in
the text files will be forced to follow Shinsengumi law and be made
to commit seppuku. (In other words they will be deleted without
warning.)

Sorry to be so harsh, but one of us moderators has to do it. I guess
I've just spent too much time reading up on Hijikata-sama. He's
beginning to influence me...

-MissBehavin
Hijikata's Chamber Maid
